pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:2.1: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:6.2: At that time the monks from the group of six were making large mouthfuls. …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:7.1: “‘I will not make a mouthful that’s too large,’ this is how you should train.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:8.1: One should not make mouthfuls that are too large.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:8.2: If a monk out of disrespect makes a large mouthful, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:9.2: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:10.1: The ninth training rule is finished.
